languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, если вас это сейчас волнует, то как представитель Инквизиции заявляю — в данной ситуации отступление не будет расцениваться как скудость веры".

"Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, если вас это сейчас волнует, то как представитель Инквизиции заявляю — в данной ситуации отступление не будет расцениваться как скудость веры".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as lack of faith in these circumstances."

"Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, no sé si ahora mismo le concierne mucho, pero como representante de la Inquisición puedo asegurarle que una retirada en estas circunstancias no se considerará indicio de falta de fe».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, no sé si ahora mismo le concierne mucho, pero como representante de la Inquisición puedo asegurarle que una retirada en estas circunstancias no se considerará indicio de falta de fe».

languages.text: “行商浪人，我不确定你现在有没有时间听我说这些，但身为审判庭的代表，我可以告诉你：在这种情况下，撤退行为并不会被视为信仰不坚。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我不确定你现在有没有时间听我说这些，但身为审判庭的代表，我可以告诉你：在这种情况下，撤退行为并不会被视为信仰不坚。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、今どれほどの余裕があるか分からないが、異端審問庁を代表して、このような状況なら、撤退しても信仰が足りないとは見なされないと言わせてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、今どれほどの余裕があるか分からないが、異端審問庁を代表して、このような状況なら、撤退しても信仰が足りないとは見なされないと言わせてくれ」

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich weiß nicht, ob Ihr jetzt Zeit für solche Dinge habt, aber als Repräsentant der Inquisition kann ich Euch sagen, dass ein Rückzug unter diesen Umständen nicht als mangelnder Glaube gewertet wird."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich weiß nicht, ob Ihr jetzt Zeit für solche Dinge habt, aber als Repräsentant der Inquisition kann ich Euch sagen, dass ein Rückzug unter diesen Umständen nicht als mangelnder Glaube gewertet wird."

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, j'ignore si vous avez le temps de prendre ceci en considération, mais en tant que représentant de l'Inquisition, je peux vous assurer qu'un repli ne sera pas considéré comme un manque de foi dans ces circonstances. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, j'ignore si vous avez le temps de prendre ceci en considération, mais en tant que représentant de l'Inquisition, je peux vous assurer qu'un repli ne sera pas considéré comme un manque de foi dans ces circonstances. »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, şu anda bu tür teferruatlara takılacak zamanın olup olmadığından emin değilim. Yine de Engizisyon'un temsilcisi olarak şunu belirtmek istiyorum: Bu şartlar altında geri çekilmek, kâfirlik olarak nitelendirilmeyecektir."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I'm unsure if you have time for such things right now, but as a representative of the Inquisition, I can tell you that a retreat will not be judged as indicating a lack of faith in these circumstances."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, şu anda bu tür teferruatlara takılacak zamanın olup olmadığından emin değilim. Yine de Engizisyon'un temsilcisi olarak şunu belirtmek istiyorum: Bu şartlar altında geri çekilmek, kâfirlik olarak nitelendirilmeyecektir."
